{"step_by_step_thinking": "Zoophobia is the fear of animals, which is common but not the most common in children. Xenophobia is the fear of strangers or foreigners, which is not typically a common childhood fear. Claustrophobia is the fear of enclosed spaces, which is also not the most common in children. Nyctophobia, or fear of the dark, is a common fear in children and is often considered the most common childhood phobia.", "answer_choice": "B"}
